title: GFA/PLB Awards fixed for October 30
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 23:00 CET GFA/PLB Awards fixed for October 30 By GNA 
Accra, Oct. 14, GNA - The Ghana Football Association (GFA) and the Premier League Board (PLB) has fixed Friday, October 30, for the 2014/15 First Capital Plus Premier League Awards at the La Palm Royal Beach Hotel, Accra. 
A statement from the GFA said, the event aimed at celebrating players, clubs and officials who distinguished themselves in the 2014/15 First Capital Plus Premier League season. 
It stated that, the planning committee will soon announce details of the event with regards to nominations among others. 
The GFA/PLB awards is an annual event organised by the football controlling body to confer honours on distinguished players and officials in the season. 
GNA
